Commands

Class ForfeitCommand

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.dv8tion.jda.api.hooks.ListenerAdapter
      • Commands.ForfeitCommand
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    net.dv8tion.jda.api.hooks.EventListener

    public class ForfeitCommand
extends net.dv8tion.jda.api.hooks.ListenerAdapter
    DeathRoll Command: Forfeit.
    • Usable by: Registered users who are currently in a duel.
    • Alias: Forfeit, df, f.
    • Arguments: None.
    • Purpose: Force the currently ongoing duel to end in a loss for the command user.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Version:
    1.3.1
    Author:
    SÃ©rgio de Aguiar (pioavenger)

    • Method Detail

      • onGuildMessageReceived

        public void onGuildMessageReceived(@NotNull
                                   @NotNull net.dv8tion.jda.api.events.message.guild.GuildMessageReceivedEvent event)
        Inherited from ListenerAdapter. This implementation handles the Forfeit command usage and can result in the following:
        • error, due to incorrect number of arguments;
        • error, due to the calling user not being registered;
        • error, due to the calling user not being in a duel;
        • error, due to an incorrect embed having been created (please contact the developer);
        • success, where an interactive embed with reacts is displayed.
        Overrides:
        onGuildMessageReceived in class net.dv8tion.jda.api.hooks.ListenerAdapter
        Parameters:
        event - The JDA event relative to a message having been read by the application in a server channel.

      • onGuildMessageReactionAdd

        public void onGuildMessageReactionAdd(@Nonnull
                                      net.dv8tion.jda.api.events.message.guild.react.GuildMessageReactionAddEvent event)
        Inherited from ListenerAdapter. This implementation handles the Forfeit command usage and can result in the following:
        • error, due to being unable to fetch the embed's color (please contact the developer);
        • error, due to the reacting user not being registered;
        • success when accepted, where the database is updated to reflect the fact that the duel ended;
        • success when declined, where the duel proceeds as if this command had never been called.
        Overrides:
        onGuildMessageReactionAdd in class net.dv8tion.jda.api.hooks.ListenerAdapter
        Parameters:
        event - The JDA event relative to a reaction having been seen added by the application in a server channel.
